title: EPIC-010: User Journey Validation - Manage Dialogs

epic.title: User Journeys & System Events
epic.goal: Validate end-to-end user journeys (chat, manage dialogs, check balance, admin operations) and implement system events for observability and auditing

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Happy path: user creates dialog with custom model and system_prompt, lists dialogs (paginated), retrieves dialog by ID
Validate: dialog settings persisted, list returns user's dialogs only, retrieve checks ownership
Error scenarios: invalid model name -> 400, dialog not found -> 404, access another user's dialog -> 403 (unless admin)
description: Validate end-to-end user journey: create dialog with custom settings (model, system_prompt, agent), list dialogs, retrieve dialog.
